entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
